ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing suspension
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:0.4_0: The training rule on receiving food
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.2_0: At that time the nun Sundarīnandā was beautiful,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.3_0: When people saw her in the dining hall, they gave her the best food, both the donors and the recipient having lust.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.4_0: Sundarīnandā ate as much as she liked,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.5_0: but not so the other nuns.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.7_0: “How could Venerable Sundarīnandā, being lustful, eat either staple or non-staple food after receiving it directly from a lustful man?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Sundarīnandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.11_0: “... How could Sundarīnandā, being lustful, eat either staple or non-staple food after receiving it directly from a lustful man?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:1.14.1_0: ‘If a lustful nun eats staple or non-staple food after receiving it directly from a lustful man, then that nun too has committed an immediate offense entailing sending away and suspension.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.8_0: in love with the meaning, the teaching that has not been in love.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.10_0: a human male, not a male spirit, not a male ghost, not a male animal. He understands and is capable of having lust.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.12_0: apart from the five staple foods, water, and tooth cleaners, the rest is called “non-staple food”.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.14_0: there are five kinds of staple food: cooked grain, porridge, flour, fish, and meat.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.15_0: If she receives staple or non-staple food with the intention of eating it, she commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.16_0: For every mouthful, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.18_0: this is said with reference to the preceding offenses.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.20_0: has been expelled in the same way.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.22_0: it is born of the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.1.24_0: ... Therefore, too, it is called “un offense entailing suspension”.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.1_0: If she receives water or tooth cleaners, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.2_0: If only the male being has lust, and she receives staple or non-staple food with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.3_0: For every mouthful, she commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.4_0: If she receives water or tooth cleaners, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.5_0: If both of them have lust, and she receives staple or non-staple food with the intention of eating it directly from a male spirit, a male ghost, a _paṇḍaka_, or a male animal in human form, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.6_0: For every mouthful, she commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.7_0: If she receives water or tooth cleaners, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.8_0: If only the male being has lust, and she receives staple or non-staple food with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.9_0: For every mouthful, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.2.10_0: If she receives water or tooth cleaners, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.3.3_0: if she receives, knowing that the man has no lust;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-ss5:2.3.6_0: The fifth offense entailing suspension is finished.
